page.title: 05AROUND BRAMLEY
page.content: Bramley is a very pleasant village surrounded by beautiful countryside. We have an electricity sub-station in a nearby wood called{Bramley Frith.} You will see a lot of{WILDLIFE}like deer,moles,rabbits,stoats,mice,pheasan ts and other birds. We have one{ {PRIMARY SCHOOL}with about 250 children In Bramley it is very peaceful with hardly any cars coming through. We have one butchers shop and two food shops and also one Post Office and one newsagents. In case of breakdowns we have a service garage.You can walk through the countryside and see all the wildlife around you,not just animals but trees and flowers too. There are many public footpaths around Bramley provided for everyone to explore our countryside.{PLEASE {REMEMBER NOT TO DROP LITTER!!!! }
